article_title: 21 States With the Worst Tax Rates
article_text:
21. Massachusetts

Effective Tax Rate: 11.44%*

Real-Estate Tax: 3.85%

Vehicle Property Tax: 0.96%

Income Tax: 3.67%

Sales & Excise Tax: 2.95%

*Effective total state and local tax rate for the median US household income earned in Massachusetts. Data and rankings from WalletHub.
